doc.title: Exit 102
doc.plot: In the early 70s, drag racing ruled the streets in the Jersey shore town of Asbury Park. When a legendary Rocker joint known as The Stone Pony opened, a wave of hippies and Rockers blew into town, launching a turf war with the Bikers and Greasers who ran the streets. At the center of it all was a beautiful young Jersey woman named Gloria who simultaneously captured the hearts of a notorious Greaser named Bobby Dilfer and an up and coming young Rocker named Johnny Balantine. In the Summer of '74, history was made on the streets off of Exit 102.
